description: Array T read by diagonals; T(i,j)=number of lattice points in triangle (possibly degenerate) with vertices (0,0),(i,0),(i,j).
maple: A049727 := proc(n,k)    if n = 0 then        1+k;    else        add(1+floor(k*x/n),x=0..n) ;    end if;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 26 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
